alert.note: Alert for Kiowa; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 2:55PM MDT until May 31 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Eastern Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 255 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Queens Reservoir, or 14 miles north of Lamar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chivington, Brandon and Sheridan Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
